column4: Hi, I have a Audio Related Problem in Ubuntu 7.04.  Audio Device: Intel HDA. It was working fine until today. I don't know what exactly is the problem, I can hear no Sound on my HeadPhone not on the Front Speakers.  Can anyone help ? Or tell me how to re-install Sound Driver ?
prime I think the problem was created by TOTEM. Don't ask me how :D
prime shouldn't something that is using the audio release it after a re-start ?
the card i still being detected? "cat /proc/asound/cards" prints something about the soundcard?
on IRQ 23  (if that means anything to you guys)
prime it was working great till yesterday
hmm... my onboard snd_hdaintel or something sometimes just die silently if I have my webcam connected
prime tried my headphone no sound
